title: How to Remove Stickers on Telegram on Android

steps.title: Open the Telegram app on your Android.
steps.content: Open the Telegram app on your Android. The Telegram icon looks like a white paper plane inside a blue circle. Telegram will open up to a list of all your personal and group chats. If it opens up to a conversation, tap the back button to go back to your chats list.

steps.title: Tap the three lines icon.
steps.content: Tap the three lines icon. This button is located in the upper-left corner of your chats list. A navigation panel will pop-up on the left-hand side of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings on the navigation panel.
steps.content: Tap Settings on the navigation panel. This option is listed next to a gray gear icon on the menu. It will open your Settings menu on a new page.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Stickers.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Stickers . This option is listed under the Messages heading. It will open a list of all the sticker packs on your phone or tablet.

steps.title: Tap the three vertical dots icon next to a sticker pack.
steps.content: Tap the three vertical dots icon next to a sticker pack. Find the sticker pack you want to remove from your library, and tap the three vertical dots next to it. It will open a pop-up menu.

steps.title: Select Remove.
steps.content: Select Remove . This will instantly delete the sticker pack from your phone or tablet. The deleted sticker pack will disappear from your stickers list.
